section.title: General info
section.para: This chapter discuss several projects present in PLD CVS. They are more or less connected with PLD, and are often mainlined by PLD developers.

section.title: Other projects
section.para: There are also several other projects in our CVS. Maintainers (or anybody else ;) are welcome to add them here. Projects listed above use PLD CVS as their main repository, elinks and twin repositories are copied in PLD CVS.

There is also lots of junk laying around in PLD repo :] It includes few dead projects, that didn't even start (like doozy, trash and something more I guess), or stuff imported there for some reason in the past, but abandoned later (like rh-4-installer).
